comments.comment:
Gossip Lanka please do not delete my comment its a kind request !

First and foremost I would like to state that I am not a friend of Piumi Hansamali or an enemy of Pooja Umashankar.
After reading all the above comments I felt really bad and sad of our Lankan people the way the have criticized Hansamali like these people [commentators here] have not done any mistakes in their life time. 
I checked the picture of Hansamali kissing her son on her FB page, I am just asking what is the big deal with that picture? she doesn't commit it in a bad intention for sure its just a kiss on her sons lips it is not a lip lock surely. All of the commentators have mentioned her as a prostitute. I would like to ask onething from all the men out there, if Piumi is a prostitute what would we call men who go to Piumi for her service? He is a male prostitute right? If no man go for a prostitute for her service then there will be no prostitutes or women like Piumi. So before calling any woman as a pros just look at the mirror and say I am the one who makes a woman a prostitute this is for all the men who degrade and disrespect women.
And the other thing is if this photo was taken by Pooja Umashankar there will be a lot of positive comments praising her that she is a humble woman, a talented actress or she is spreading love [ What a joke] only because she came from India, talk nicely, hugging each and everyone who comes before her so most of our Lankan fools think that she is a most respectable kind hearted humble woman. lol. Pooja is the only actress out of this world walks along with a photographer taking pics wherver she goes and whatever she does. Posting in FB and seeking cheap publicity, not Piumi Nadeesha or Aksha are attention whore's or attention seekers but definitly Pooja Umashankar. But sadly when our actresses post a pic Lankans put all valgur comments and call them as whores or sluts, but when the same thing done by Pooja Lankans call her as an Angel, humble actress and she is spreading love. Why this kind of justice for our own actresses, Poeple make mistakes it is natural and who said Pooja is a 'PATTHINI'? she slept with directors just to grab offers and still she gives her service to few Lankan business man for money. Pooja slept with directors like Bala, Seeman who are big time anti Singalese who fights for Ealam. After sleeping with all the Madarasi Tamils she comes here and shows a good face, she knows really well that Singalese are Modayo' She lives in SL for more than 10 years acting in Singala films but still stammering to speak in Singala what a joke and saying everywhere [only in Lanka] that her Mom is a Singhala. Conclusion is Pooja is a Patthini and Piumi and all other lankan actress are just whores for most of our Lankan fools. Think before judjing people for god's sake. I will get more than 100 dislikes for this post I know.
comments.author: Dilrukshi Amara

comments.comment: ඒ වයසෙදි අම්මා කෙනෙක් උන එක ගැන ගෙදරින් කිව්වේ ...ගොනා ගැහුවට කමක්නෑ සල්ලි හොයන්න ...අඩුම තරමේ පෙත්තක් වත් ගන්න පාමසි යක් තිබුනේ නැද්ද කියලා...මාස නමයක්ම ඉතින් බිස්නස් ලොස්නෙ

comments.comment: අර මේකිගෙ ගෙඩි දෙක මිරිකන පොටෝ වල ඉන්න එකාගෙ පවුල් ජීවිතේ දැන් ලස්සනට ගෙවෙනව ඇති
comments.author: Ranga Sanjeewa

comments.comment: යකෝ ලමයට අවුරුදු හයයි....මේකිගෙ පැරණි පෙම්වතා එක්ක අවුරුදු තුනහ මාරකට කලින්ලු මේක අරගත්තේ.....මේ ගොන් බඩුව හිතන් ඉන්නේ ලංකාවේ ඉන්න හැම කෙල්ලටම පෙම්වත්තු දුසිම් ගනන් ඉන්නවා කියලද කොහෙද.....මුන්ගෙ අධ්‍යාපනේ තරම දෙන ගොන් කතන්දර වලින්ම පේනවා ......බැදපු එකා ෂුවර් එකටම පොන්නයෙක් වෙන්ටැ
comments.author: Ranga Sanjeewa

comments.comment: මේවා මුන් හිතලම කරන ඒවා බන්.මොකද මුන්ට දක්ෂතාවයක් කියල එකක් ගෑවිලාවත් නෑ.කොහෙවත් ඉදල ඇවිල්ලා නිෂ්පාදකගේ ඉදන් ලයිට් අල්ලන එකා දක්වා උන්ට රෙද්ද උස්සල ටීවී එකේ මුණ දාගත්තම මේ මී වැස්සියෝ හිතන්නේ මුන් තරම් නිලියෝ ලංකාවේ වෙන නෑ කියල.ඉතින් ජනප්‍රිය වෙන්න මේ වගේ සිගිති ආතල් දෙන්නේ
